entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • msbuild / dotnet build does not pass the property generated by nuget packagereference's GeneratePathProperty #20160
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Include additional data in results of ShowMissingWorkloads task for Visual Studio in-product acquisition #20151
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • When workload MSI package fails to download, output is not ideal #20143
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Workload installer needs to be aware of x64-retargeted packs #20139
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • dotnet format produces false positives on CS0234 and CS0103 #20126
    Area-External, untriaged
  • .NET 6 preview 6.0.100-rc.1.21416.1 DevCerts Requiring Escalated Privileges With Every New WebApp #20124
    Area-External, untriaged
  • SDK 3.1 builds C#9 code in a way leading to bugs #20119
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App', version '5.0.0' was not found #20116
    Area-External, untriaged
  • When will .net 6 and .net 5 support the comment in the method to display Chinese? #20112
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Run multiple test assemblies in parallel with dotnet test and NUnit #20115
    documentation, Area-DotNet Test
  • NETSDK1145: 'The Apphost pack is not installed' error while building C++\CLI project (targeting .NET 5) with Visual Studio 2019 16.11.1 if Visual Studio 2022 17.0.0 Preview 3.1 is installed #20109
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Workload repair ignores planned action #20108
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.2xx

Closed

  • With RC1 initial build installed, maui workload install failed in CLI: One or more errors occurred. (microsoft.maui.core.ref.android.msi.x64::6.0.100-rc.1.1351 is not found #20111
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Project templates from workloads are not shown in `dotnet new` template list (MSI based install) #20146
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • BlazorAOT workload installation not working #19798
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Consecutive installs should report installed workload #20085
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.2xx
  • Workload repair without any installed workloads should be a no-op #20092
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Concurrent workload commands uninstall each other #20094
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.2xx
  • Repair causes fatal exception when you add the metadata file for MSI to a applocal file based installation #20096
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.2xx
  • MicrosoftNETPlatformLibrary property for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App fails with NRE for .NET Core 3.0 #10470
    Area-NetSDK, Backlog
  • [Component Licensing] SDK needs to make sure that licenses.licx ends up as "EmbeddedResource" #3631
    Feature Request, Area-NetSDK, Backlog
  • SDK doesn't restore WPF design-time projects properly #13149
    Area-NetSDK, Backlog
  • [ARM32]With .NET 6 Preview1, running application failed with error required library libhostfxr.so could not be found. #15757
    Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx
  • Runtime identifier is not forwarded when publishing exe project references (self-contained mode) #16184
    Area-NetSDK, 6.0.2xx
  • Suspicious code found inside the ResolvePackageAssets task #16447
    Area-NetSDK, 6.0.2xx
  • net 6.0 throws NETSDK1005 error during publish as it does not accept the property "TargetFramework" #19487
    Area-NetSDK, 6.0.2xx
  • `dotnet new android` attempts to restore Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm64 #19891
    Area-External, untriaged, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Version conflict during compilation #20048
    Area-NetSDK, Discussion
  • 'Dotnet tool restore' doesn't update toolResolverCache file #20043
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Unable to reference Net5.0 C# project from Net5.0 C++ project #20002
    Area-NetSDK, Discussion
  • `error MC1000: Unknown build error` when using reference assembly and XAML #19884
    Area-NetSDK, Discussion
  • Can't publish x64 self-contained app from an Arm64 machine #20137
    untriaged
  • Native assets in nuget for net48 project are not copied to bin for ClassLibrary, but are copied for App #20073
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Static Web Assets build error with .net 6 preview 7 #20008
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Consider removing comments in new templates #20062
    untriaged
  • .NET SDK 5.0.400 not available for Ubuntu 18.04 #19983
    Area-Linux, Discussion
  • Projects with AssemblyName != Filename cannot be found #20120
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Update implicit global usings feature to address issues #19521
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx
  • dotnet watch can be extended #19988
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • first dotnet watch build notify it was done by dotnet watch #19987
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102548-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #19861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #sdk-102550-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #19859
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-103310-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19981
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #20166
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #20165
    Area-External
  • Improve command output for no op workload repair #20164
    Area-Workloads
  • Do not show help on internal workload error #20163
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #20162
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from microsoft/vstest #20161
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #20159
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #20158
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [Release/6.0.1xx-rc1]Dispose Open handle on the package #20156
    Area-External, Servicing-consider
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/fsharp #20155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Project Reference support for WinRT Components #20153
    Area-External, Servicing-consider
  • Backport https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/pull/19771 to RC1 #20152
    Servicing-consider, Area-Compatibility
  • Serve aspnet-browser-refresh.js from a rooted path #20150
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update a bunch of test projects to the current target framework #20148
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do not fail design time builds when there are missing workload packs #20147
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #20141
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #20140
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Arch-independent support for `dotnet run` #20102
